entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 5:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023
